description:
This module focuses on emerging issues in Marketing Analytics, covering a diverse range of issues including quantitive methods, qualitative methods, technology, and Artificial Intelligence.

While conventional analytical methods are still important, Special Topics will also include cutting-edge methods for big data for new businesses.

Students in the MSc Marketing Analytics and Insights will benefit from familiazing with such new knowledge and skills in analysing these new business models and forecasting future trend and opportunties.

Pedagogical-wise, Special Topics will combine lectures, case studies, group discussions, self reflection, student presentation, and other teaching tools that are appropriate depending on the topic discussed.
title: Special Topics in Marketing Analytics and Insights
